recipe_name: Broccoli soup with mint cream and crisp pancetta
author: Aldo Zilli
method: Place the broccoli, garlic and stock in a saucepan and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5-6 minutes, then season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Stir in the mint and double cream, then blend until smooth with a stick blender.  Fry the pancetta in a dry pan for 3-4 minutes, or until crisp, then drain on kitchen paper.  To serve, return the soup to the pan to warm through if necessary, then ladle into a bowl. Arrange the crisp pancetta on the top of the bowl of soup and garnish with the fresh mint.
ingredients: Â½ head broccoli, chopped,  2 garlic cloves, crushed,  400ml/14fl oz vegetable stock,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tbsp chopped fresh mint,  150ml/5fl oz double cream,  2 slices pancetta,  1 fresh mint sprig, to garnish
